description:
After Nagano Prefectural Police Inspector Takeda is murdered, Lieutenant Kano is found dead from hanging in his home. From the body`s condition, Inspector Morofushi reasons that after being strangled, the body was hanged from the ceiling by someone. Later, the culprit sends an e-mail declaring that he will kill three additional people. Segreant Akiyama is called to Mt. Saijozan by the culprit and is dragged off a cliff by a car. Inspector Yamato`s fingerprints are found on the rope that was wrapped around Kano`s neck, and Section One Chief Kuroda puts out a BOlO for Yamato as the suspect who murdered three men...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Les ténèbres de la police départementale (2e partie)
The Darkness of the Prefectural Police (Part 2)
